data.comment: The match is underway in Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 2, Free kick Gremio.
Diego Souza of Gremio gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
In Sao Paulo, Luan of Corinthians is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Gremio.
Darlan Mendes of Gremio smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Matheus Henrique for Gremio drives towards goal at Neo Quimica Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Gremio's Diego Souza attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
In Sao Paulo Corinthians's Davo is caught offside.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 14, Corinthians's Victor Cantillo has been booked in Sao Paulo and will miss the next match through suspension.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Throw-in Corinthians.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 17, Darlan Mendes (Gremio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Gremio throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Romulo Otero is back on the pitch.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sao Paulo to check on Romulo Otero, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Gremio in the half of Corinthians.
Gremio's Jean Pyerre misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 23, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corinthians are pushing forward but Luan's finish is wide of the goal.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Gremio a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Corinthians push forward at Neo Quimica Arena and Fabio Santos gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Gremio defence.
Romulo Otero of Corinthians is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 29, Can Gremio capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Marllon Corinthians.
Attention is being given to Gremioâ€™s Matheus Henrique and play has been suspended briefly.
The home team have replaced Davo with Bruno Mendez. This is the first substitution made today by Vagner Mancini.
In the minute 35, Gremio drive upfield and Jean Pyerre gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Corinthians defender.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 36, Matheus Henrique for Gremio is back on the field again.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 40, Pepe (Gremio) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Romulo Otero for Corinthians has been booked by Caio Max Augusto Vieira and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
The fourth official's board shows 8 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Corinthians are coming forward and Romulo Otero gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
In the minute 45, Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 45, Important block from the Gremio defence as Fagner fires in a strike for Corinthians.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
In the minute 45, Gremio will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Corinthians.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 46, Gremio make their first substitution with Diogo Barbosa replacing Bruno Cortez.
Cesar Pinares is on a sub for Darlan Mendes for Gremio.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Gremio.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 51, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 53, Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Gremio at Neo Quimica Arena.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Corinthians.
In the minute 56, Bruno Mendez (Corinthians) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in high up the field for Corinthians in Sao Paulo.
Corinthians's Luan is on target but unsuccessful.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, The match at Neo Quimica Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Romulo Otero, who is down injured.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gremio's Luiz Fernando Morais dos Santos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Corinthians defender.
In the minute 63, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 64, Romulo Otero returns to the field for Corinthians after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Gremio at Neo Quimica Arena.
Gremio are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 66, At Neo Quimica Arena, Romulo Otero has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
Gremio drives forward and Cesar Pinares gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Corinthians just outside Gremio's area.
In the minute 69, In Sao Paulo Corinthians attack through Luan. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Joao Vitor Xavier de Almeida is replacing Victor Cantillo for the home team.
The home team replace Jonathan Cafu with Lucas Piton Crivellaro.
Can Gremio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Corinthians's half?
In the minute 73, Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Diego Churin is replacing Luis Orejuela for the away team.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 76, Gremio's Pepe misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Corinthians.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Fagner gets his shot on target but fails to score for Corinthians.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Corinthians throw-in in Gremio's half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 82, Renato Gaucho is making the team's fourth substitution at Neo Quimica Arena with Victor Ferraz replacing Matheus Henrique.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Gremio drive forward but Pedro Geromel is judged offside.
In the minute 83, Renato Gaucho (Gremio) is making a fifth substitution, with Isaque replacing Jean Pyerre.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Corinthians a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Guilherme Camacho is replacing Gabriel for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Leo Natel is on a sub for Luan for Corinthians.
In the minute 88, Gremio pushes forward through Diego Souza, whose finish on goal is saved.
Gremio's Luiz Fernando Morais dos Santos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Corinthians defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Gremio push forward at Neo Quimica Arena and Diego Souza gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Corinthians defence.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Isaque of Gremio gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Corinthians's Leo Natel has run offside.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gremio are pushing forward but Victor Ferraz's finish is wide of the goal.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Corinthians a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
